page.title: 14CHILDREN'S GAMES
page.content: Favourite games on summer weekends are running games,making dens,hide and seek,riding bikes,playing with toys outside,taking the dog for a walk, playing with bats and balls and going on swings.If it rains indoor activities would be watching television,reading,playing board games such as draughts,chess,monopoly,snakes and ladders,playing with toys such as cars, dolls, farm,lego,listening to records,practising musical instruments At school most people like playing cards and board games and dressing up on rainy play times.Outside in winter most people play sliding and snowballing.In summer most people like to play tig and playing in the plantation.Most peoples favourite school games are tig and cricket.
